sources.title: BerehneTaZohrBaSorat1976
sources.description: Synopsis A young man kills his creditor, and is forced to live with a woman who has witnessed the crime and abandon his fiancee. However, the truth is soon known, and when the man attempts to escape, he falls down a cliff and dies. Cast: Behrouz Behnejad, Iren, Akbar Jannati Shirazi, Fereshte Jenabi, Faramarz Sadighi Title: Speeding Naked Till High Noon | Berehne ta zohr ba sorat (1976) Directed by: Khosrow Haritash Date of birth: 1932, Teheran, Iran Date of death: 1980, Teheran, Iran Writing credits: Khosrow Haritash Year: 1976 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Black & White Runtime: 105 min
